question: What should i do to control my anger
answer:
QUESTION
What should i do to control my anger
ANSWER


Share:
Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Do not get angry and you will
receive Jannah.'

He also advised that if one is angry and is standing, he/she should sit down
and if he/she is sitting he/she should lie down and if he/she is lying down,
he/she should make Wudhu.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
